attributes.name: category
attributes.description: The product category (e.g., clothing, electronics, home goods).

attributes.name: material
attributes.description: The primary material used in the product (e.g., cotton, plastic, metal).

attributes.name: brand
attributes.description: The main brand of the product.

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: The colors available for the product (e.g., red, blue, green).

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: The size options available for the product (e.g., small, medium, large).

attributes.name: rechargeable
attributes.description: Indicates whether the product is rechargeable (true/false).

attributes.name: waterproof
attributes.description: Indicates whether the product is waterproof (true/false).

attributes.name: warranty
attributes.description: The warranty period offered for the product (e.g., none, 1 year, 2 years).

attributes.name: origin_country
attributes.description: The country where the product is manufactured (e.g., USA, China, Germany).

attributes.name: features
attributes.description: List of distinct features that the product has/offers.
